Name: Name Change, Merchant Marine Memorial Plaza, S.I.
Title: A Local Law in relation to naming Merchant Marine Memorial Plaza, Borough of Staten Island.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section  1. The following plaza name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

New NamePresent NameLimitsMerchant Marine Memorial Plazanonethe existing north shore esplanade walkway located between Pier No. 1 and Department of Transportation building No. 11 at the Saint George Ferry Terminal















THC - LS # 1664
2/6/03
